data.persona: I enjoy beating metal into place! My father was killed by faulty armor, and it is my mission in life to create an armor that no man, beast, or inanimate object can pierce. As you can see, I have incredibly strong arms (no pun intended, har har). All alloys will submit to my hammer.
data.description:
You are in the Cottage safe-room.
Stocked from floor to ceiling, food and medicine line the western wall. The room is painted matte grey and contains a chest to the left of the food and medicine. Three chairs and a table with a lamp are what is left in the middle of the safe-room. Dimly lit, and a steady water supply coming from the well outside of the cottage.
There's a table, a chair, a food, a computer, and a medicine here.
The genie is here.

You are carrying a Mighty hammer, and wearing an apron and a tunic.

data.short_motivation: I want to put on one of my armors
data.mid_motivation: I want to impress the genie with the quality of my armor
data.long_motivation: I want the to be included in the list of diligent workers that the genie is putting together in order to receive a special reward
